sentences.en: And yet , of course, these trinkets are endearing. Ha ha !

sentences.en: Everything there has Become so familiar and so , endearing to me.

sentences.en: He finds human foibles endearing, but is unforgiving of pretension.
sentences.cn: 他觉得人性的弱点很可爱，但不能容忍惺惺作态。

sentences.en: He had lately begun to make clumsy yet endearing overtures of friendship.
sentences.cn: 最近他开始主动表示友好，样子笨拙却又招人喜爱。

sentences.en: It an endearing and infectious characteristic and carries people through situations successfully.

sentences.en: Mr. Ewell was endearing himself to his fellow citizens.

sentences.en: My ancestral home is so endearing.
sentences.cn: 我的父母之乡是可爱的.

sentences.en: My failure to clean up the kitchen suddenly became less endearing.
sentences.cn: 我未能清理厨房的行为突然之间变得不是那么可爱了.

sentences.en: Paulson's inability to dissimulate is at times endearing.
sentences.cn: 有些时候,保尔森不善伪装的性格显得可爱.
